page.description: When the Tables/Sets tab of the Control Panel is visible, select a table and click Table > Properties to display the Table Information dialog box. The Table Information dialog box displays the following information about a table:

section.title: Indexes :
section.description: Name, Filter Expression, Order Expression, Sort Flags

section.title: Statistics :
section.description: Last update date and time, Record Count, Deleted Records, Type, File Size, File Name and Path
